eventDeatureData.Heading: HLD of Food Delivery App
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: Are you hungry for some knowledge about the high-level design of food delivery apps? Look no further!
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_1: In this webinar, we'll delve into the delicious details of how apps like Swiggy and Zomato manage to bring your favourite meals straight to your door. From coordinating complex delivery logistics to satisfying your cravings in a snap, we'll explore the technology that made these apps highly successful.
eventDeatureData.paragraph24: Understand the design & functionality of a food delivery app
eventDeatureData.paragraph4: Study the use of data flow diagrams for an online food ordering system
eventDeatureData.paragraph5: Familiarize yourself with real-time database management systems & NoSQL
eventDeatureData.paragraph6: Learn techniques for scaling a system to accommodate millions of users
eventDeatureData.para5: Learn the Pre-requisites of this Masterclass for FREE
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_2: SDEs Wishing to convert to product companies from Service companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_3: SDEs wanting to learn System Design
eventDeatureData.para7: What our Learners have to say
eventDeatureData.paragraph15: We are a leading provider of specialized courses in Data Structures and System Design in our Full Stack Software Development Program. We are dedicated to helping working professionals advance their careers and gain the technical expertise needed to succeed in the fast-paced world of technology.
eventDeatureData.paragraph16: Some of our standout features include:
eventDeatureData.paragraph17: Curriculum that is developed, supervised and approved by industry experts
eventDeatureData.paragraph18: 1:1 mentorship, guided by top experts in the field
eventDeatureData.paragraph19: Opportunities to gain technical expertise through real-world projects
eventDeatureData.paragraph20: Over 250 hiring partners and dedicated placement support
eventDeatureData.paragraph22: Sign up for a free demo class and enroll in the domain of your choice.
